entry.title: No Manners
entry.summary:
Author: mxrshere

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,547Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Chan’s grip of Felix’s jaw tightens, their faces inches apart and she speaks low enough for only Felix to hear, “keep it up. I fucking dare you.” There’s a kind of twisted amusement in her voice that tells Felix just how close she’s pushing her.“Right,” Felix flashes a wicked grin, nose scrunching as she does, “‘cause you’re just so scary, huh?”Chan simply smiles, a soft ‘hm’ leaving her throat as she drops Felix’s face.
